PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-08082011-07-11,  AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectAgri-Recovery - 2011 Canada-British Columbia Feed Assistance and Pasture Restoration Initiative
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide assistance through the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program under the federal-provincial-territorial AgriRecovery Framework, in order to help livestock producers from BRITISH COLUMBIA deal with the prolonged impact of drought, flooding and wildfires experienced in 2010 on pastures and the availability of feed.
AttachmentsAttachment
